title: Bug 102436 - Date/time value not stored correctly in report design
description: An invalid date/time string (which does not conform to a universal format or the system default locale format) should have been rejected.
OB: When a DateTime type report parameter is created in the BIRT report designer and an invalid date string, such as '55/66/9999', is entered in the 'default value' field of the parameter's properties, the date value is accepted without any validation.
EB: (2) The date value should have been validated by the UI or Model to reject invalid date strings.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the BIRT report designer. 2. Create a new report parameter of type 'DateTime'. 3. In the 'default value' field of the parameter's properties, enter an invalid date string, such as '55/66/9999'.
